name: License & Credential Verification
description: Automated RN/CNA license verification workflow that checks credentials against state nursing boards and NCSBN database, flags expired licenses or disciplinary actions, and updates candidate status
useCase: Healthcare staffing agencies must verify that RN and CNA licenses are valid, active, and free from disciplinary actions before placing candidates. This workflow automates license verification by checking multiple databases every 6 hours, flagging issues, and notifying recruiters of verification status.
